website_summaries.verdict: An energy efficient hot and cold water top-loading water dispenser.
pros: Top-loading mechanism can handle 3 and 5 gallon bottles and is easy to load
Large paddle spouts make it easy and convenient to fill up a cup with a single hand
Hot water spout has a child-safety lock to avoid burns
cons: The hot water can be the point of near boiling, creating a safety hazard for younger children

customer_reviews.title: Died fast, can't find the company to help
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March, it died by September, blowing out the fuses as it did so. I cannot find customer service info for the company to see if it's covered. Nice aesthetically, but I guess it was my mistake to trust price & reviews. Functioned great until it's early demise. **Update February*** - Amazon support led me to the manufacturer for assistance. They asked some questions and are sending out a replacement. I've updated this review and rating to reflect the improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: READ THE POOR REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: READ THE POOR REVIEWS because they're absolutely true. There has to be some black magic with the positive reviews. I had this for less than 3 months before it started leaking like crazy. Seriously. An entire bottle of water soaked into the carpet and no customer service to boot. Lovely.
customer_reviews.author: M. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying this product as it may leak like mine did and cause major water damage to you house.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product right until it started leaking out of the hot water dispenser about 4 months after I bought it. There does not appear to be any manufacturer contact information provided at all with this product, so I have no way of knowing how to get it repaired or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: klaatu

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: The water dispenser was broken after only 5 weeks, it started leaking at the top of the unit and leaked all over the floor. Would not recommend this item or seller. The seller did not reply to any of my emails, trying to fix the issue. Thank goodness for Amazon on the refund!
customer_reviews.author: street_uk

customer_reviews.title: Constant Leaking
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. We purchased this in January, installed it and immediately had leaking problems. I contacted amazon who put my in contact with the distributor. They completed troubleshooting over the phone. It did not correct the issue. They mailed parts and it fixed the leak temporarily. Each time we corrected a leak, another started.
customer_reviews.author: Heather mooney

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit, not very practical as it was difficult to fill up bigger water bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Our unit was defective. There was no cold water at all. We ended up returning it. I do not know what the problem was but our expectation was to have cold and hot water as the item is described to provide. The spouts for water were awkward to use without spilling and it was difficult to fill a big water bottle without leaking. There is no external night light so you have to turn on the room light before use when it gets dark.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great hot/cold water dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with a ZeroWater Filter Bottle Water Cooler Bottle and it works magically! Very easy to set up and a very pure and clean tasting water results. The Avalon water dispenser is great. It's a very attractive unit that is elegant but yet simply designed. It looks great in the kitchen and knowing that pure hot or cold water is readily available is, well.... refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob G.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, serious leaking issue from top
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product as we moved to a house with well water and needed something for the family to drink. Beware, this thing is hit or miss with regards to whether it resides to leak everywhere out of the top, underneath the ring where the water bottle sits. It makes no sense why this happens but I usually have to disassemble and change it’s position which then sometimes fix the problem. However this has happened on four separate occasions with no warning and if I hadn’t heard it splattering on the floor, I would have 5 gallons of water seeping through the hardwoods. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Box Hill Crew

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got tired or paying one of the name brand water delivery service exorbitant fees to rent a cooler and buy 5 gallon bottles of water. And after months of unreliable service, I decided to buy my own. This arrived quickly and was very easy to set up. I buy my bottles now at the supermarket and wholesale club for basically the same price but without delivery fees and the frustration of missed appointments and incorrect orders. This appliance is quiet, chills and heat water quickly and is much slimmer than what we had previously. I tried the hot water dispense the other night and made a hot chocolate and it was perfect piping hot water...instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Hypercussion

customer_reviews.title: Water gushing after 1 year and 25 days.
customer_reviews.text: Update: just after a year and 25 days, Water leaked all over the floor. Water gushing inside the dispenser. Problem now is warranty is expired!! Hot and cold works well, hot has safety. At the back, it has a switch to turn on hot and cold. Little humming from the compressor, its normal. Humming is off when compressor is not in use (auto on/off). Water gets cold within 30 min, same with hot. Price is reasonable. Very happy with the purchase. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonix

customer_reviews.title: Love our water cooler!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this water cooler for over a year and half now and love it. After a lot of research I decided on this one and have been very happy with it. We use it everyday and go thru a lot of water in our house. It runs very quiet, is easy to clean and the water comes out very cold. My only complaint is that the hot water comes out way too hot!! Scorching hot! We however don't use it so I decided to turn off the hot water side. I would definitely, with no hesitation order this water cooler again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle I.

customer_reviews.title: Find another brand
customer_reviews.text: We have had 2 of these water coolers now, run away and find another brand. The first one lasted 10 months before it ceased to function at all. The hot water dispenser only worked for 6 weeks. The second one lasted 2 weeks, before the heating element inside got so hot that the entire bottle of water heated-up. Once I can believe was a lemon, but twice says a lot about quality control by a company and manufacturing design.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J.

customer_reviews.title: Where are you installing it? It might be a little loud for your tastes.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this water cooler. It is slim, keeps water super cold/hot and fits perfectly in a cubby in the kitchen. The only problem is that this thing has a hum... a noticeable hum that can be annoying at first. Eventually I learned to just deal with it and soon enough, with a few months, almost forget it is there. I think that is my only note to say about the machine. It is not super loud, but don't expect to read a book next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Snow

customer_reviews.title: Nice Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler since my existing one (different manufacturer) no longer chilled the water. This cooler works well with chilled and heated water. I've detected no leaks. The only issue is how fast the water comes out. I never realized how fast my first cooler dispensed the water (it only had chilled water). The funny thing about buying this cooler was that I was trying to get a different brand, but I couldn't see it on the list on the Amazon site, so I bought this one. A week after buying it, the one I really wanted was now on the site, and it was $50 cheaper (but no hot water, but that's okay with me).
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I wish I got this a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: I decided to drink more water after talking to my doctor but water sucks here. So I brought a Vitapur water Dispenser filter bottle. Avalon water cooler was recommended along with another filter. I was scare not too sure how to get this to work. Vitapur said to remove the bottle support and place the bottle in the top. I filled it up and no leaks. It made noise first time I turned it on. I just have to say hot is hot you can see steam. I don't really plan to use hot much maybe for hot chocolate. The cold is really cold and when combined with the Vitapur filter system it tastes so good.
customer_reviews.author: Randall D. Lind

customer_reviews.title: Leaky and slow to cool!
customer_reviews.text: Leaks! Installed our first bottle on it, immediately started trickling out the bottom front. Adjusted it to be sure it was level and it seemed to stop. Woke up to gallons on the floor. Unacceptable. Starting the joy of customer support now...
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Good while working then randomly explodes.
customer_reviews.text: We have had our water dispenser a little under two years and up until yesterday really like it. Yesterday afternoon we heard a loud noise and then water started spilling out everywhere! Water was rust colored and warm to the touch. While it was working it was a 5 star but the fact that it exploded after 20 months makes it a 2 now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Salinas

customer_reviews.title: DIED IN 8 MONTHS! Do not buy! Manufacturer is nonexistent.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why there are so many good reviews for this thing. It died in 8 months. I scoured the web trying to find any information about Avalon. Absolutely no luck what-so-ever. Amazon gave me a number to an Avalon in California who laughed when I called asking about water coolers. We also couldn't get a reply from 'ExcellentProductsInc,' who we purchased the cooler from. I would not advise purchasing unless you only need a water cooler for 8 months. It seems many of the reviews are from people who got a deal on this thing. Save your money, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyJames

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: The Avalon water cooler is a sleek looking unit and was very easy to set up. It is not that heavy so can be handled by most adults. After running a few quarts of water through the system to flush out any manufacturing residue (see instructions for set up), the water cooler was ready to turn on. Cold water was produced quickly and the temperature of the cold water is just right for me. I am not interested in dispensing hot water so I have not turned on the heater. That is a great option to have. This water cooler is priced well and has many advanced features not offered with other manufacturers' water coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We were renting our cooler for $6 or so per month from our delivery service of water. When they raised the rental fee to $9, we realized we'd been paying for about 5 years for the same unit that THEY offered to clean for only $59.99. We looked at the Amazon offerings and selected this model. LOVE. "the water machine" is our 4.5 year old Grandson's name and he wants one for their house. Cold, Hot... Expect to have for years. Great Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: ENRAGED
customer_reviews.text: I’m so pissed. I received this Monday (9-21-2020) and today (9-23-2020) the water cooler is already broken. It will not get cold at all!!!! Since the light was off, we thought it was cold enough and ready. It’s room temperature!!! We flip the switch back and forth, and the light will not come on. It’s like the compressor is broken. The hot water light will come on when we switch it on, and we have unplugged it and plugged it back in. But the cold water light will not come on at all. It’s completely dead. I’m LIVID. Paid money for junk.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: water leaking problem.
customer_reviews.text: it's broken item. a lot of water leaking on the top. what's wrong? it makes my floor all wet. crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, Leaks, Leaks...and Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to get this to stop leaking since I received it. I give up...no support from company and I am tired of water soaked floors. DO NOT BUY THIS...NO SUPPORT...AND NOTHING BUT TROUBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Sydne M. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: The cooler works great and I love that fact that my hot water is ready for my tea anytime I want. The water is prefect hot or cold when needed. I did have a problem with my cooler after a few months but customer service was great in resolving my problem. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TONYA D

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Taste
customer_reviews.text: I use this cooler dispenser every day for cold water, and my wife uses it for hot water (for tea). I've run hundreds of gallons of water through it, AFTER trying a hot water and white vinegar mix that some customers recommended -- to no avail. There is still a plastic taste to the water. The old Elkay unit we had never had that plastic taste because they used copper tubing inside the unit.
customer_reviews.author: TodPkg

customer_reviews.title: failed once but customer service was spot on
customer_reviews.text: Really nice item to have to get instant cold or hot water. we love the convenience. However ... Less than one year from date of purchase this cooler has stopped cooling water. It continues to make hot water but water is only room temperature from the cold tap. amended: yes the cooler failed, but customer service stood behind the product and after a few emails to diagnose the problem, they sent a replacement and return shipping for the failed item.
customer_reviews.author: Broke Dad

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and does the job. My previous cooler seemed to get the water a little colder, but in reality, this works just fine. During really hot weather too cold water on your throat is dangerous. The water is very cool/cold and a little better than average. I recommend this unit. The hot works very well, although I only used it to test, as we have 98+ degree weather 9 months out of the year.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Must Have!! It’s perfect! Fast delivery, easy set up, and merchants gives you a 1 year warranty! It takes 15-20 for the hot water to get hot during the set up and it only takes 1 hour for the cold water to reach its temperature. I love it and it’s safer for children since it has a safety feature on the hot water dispenser. It makes a little bit of noise but it’s not disturbing. It’s sleek and fits in any room no matter the size. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rouse

customer_reviews.title: I like it just fine
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. The direction said to flush some water through the system, which makes sense. It took a lot to get the taste out of the water. Not sure what, plastic taste of dust or what ever. But it took a few gallons to get the taste out. It is somewhat quiet running, but in a quiet house you can hear it clearly and easily. Maybe in a normal noise level you would not.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gutzmer

customer_reviews.title: Idk how I lived without this. A lot more affordable than bottled water
customer_reviews.text: I live in BFN on a well and it has a lot of sulfur, after years of cases and gallons of water I got this and it's amazing. Not only have we cut out so much recycling we also drink a lot more water because it's right there... Cold, ready to drink... Or ready to make hot tea. +++ Big plus. When the power goes out for days you can still use it. Props to the designer for that. -1 for little ring under jug that doesn't drain or go anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Mine must be a dud.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is a after-taste that started about 5 weeks after purchase. Now we do not even use it. Tried cleaning it multiple times without any satisfaction. Goodwill will appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Khaleesi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t WASTE your money!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!! No Returns either!! We just got it yesterday and it’s insanely LOUD & is already leaking! This is our 3rd water machine so we thought it would be no problem ordering it thru here. We had no idea if there was a problem we wouldn’t be able to return it!!!! Don’t WASTE YOUR MONRY!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Vanderwall

customer_reviews.title: Quite disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed with the product. After using for about a month, I noticed a burning smell coming from the unit. After trying to figure out where abouts from the unit, decided to turn off the hot water function from the back of the unit. I purchased the unit for the hot and cold water function and am not able use the unit to the fullest. I've already gotten rid of box and the unit is so big.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Sue

customer_reviews.title: Stop picking up water bottles from around the house.
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler has been a huge hit with my sons. I love not having bottles everywhere. The water is cool, it’s simple to load, and easy to use. I like that I can keep the hot water off so I’m not wasting power heating something I’m not using. Not the easiest to fill large bottles have to hold them at an angle. Which makes it tough to then see how much you’ve got. Overall I’ve really enjoyed having it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this water cooler comes in handy in my house ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this water cooler comes in handy in my house I have 4 teenage daughters the prefer to drink water before anything. I used to buy the cases of water bottle but it water bottles took up so much room in my refrigerator n than to keep restocking them my daughters and there friends went threw about 3 to 4 cases a week and this is so much better also comes in handy to make baby bottles with the hot water I put half hot and half cold water before adding the formula and it’s great. The baby bottle is ready in seconds as to heating up the bottle he starts to cry he’s waiting so long
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with ZeroWater ZJ-003 Filtration Water Cooler Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: The ZeroWater filtration bottle will work with "most" standard coolers, per their documentation, but not this one. The well is too shallow and the bottle won't be stable. Not necessarily a bad product, but there isn't an easy way to know this won't work ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Shaevel

customer_reviews.title: Everything has been working great so far (2 months)
customer_reviews.text: Everything has been working great so far (2 months), I am docking 1 star because it is not as stable as I would have wished. I have young kids and I did not feel comfortable only using the on hold down point as suggested. I ended up opening the front panel and screwing through the bottom of the cooler body. It is now as stable as any water cooler I have ever used. This may have been over paranoia as a parent but a 5 gallon jug of water falling on a young kid would be disastrous.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy! Boiling hot water but child proof
customer_reviews.text: Low price. Works great! The hot water side is actually childproof and pretty difficult for a child to figure out. Purchased for our medical clinic and is quite the workhorse! The machine is not loud like some of the previous ones we've had. Just your average water dispenser, doesn't look fancy or modern like some of the other ones do. But for this price and quality, you really can't beat it! Water comes or icy cold and super boiling hot (enough to make instant noodles/coffee/tea). Uses you standard water bottles or reusuable water bottles. No storage space under the dispenser. On and off switch is behind the machine. Ready to use out of the box! Delivery was fast and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: TNg

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water cool and lasts for months, amazing customer support.
customer_reviews.text: The water cooler was easy to install, just put in water and rinse the machine. I heard some people say there were leaks after some months, but so far after 6 months, no leaks. However, it seems it is on constantly, but it seems normal in 100 degree weather, and the water is still chilled.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Warranty Assistance Needed
customer_reviews.text: I need assistance with getting authorization to return. I am on my 2nd unit. This first unit was purchased in Apr 2017 and was replaced because is stopped dispensing hot water. The replacement unit was received in October of 2017. Unfortunately, I woke up this morning to a leaking unit. The equipment is supposed to have a 1 yr warranty. I will attempt to contact the manufacturer with hopes of a timely resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Johnw

customer_reviews.title: WORKED GOOD FOR 1 YEAR
customer_reviews.text: 1 WEEK AFTER THE WARRANTY EXPIRED THE HOT WATER WENT OUT.. WHAT CAN I SAY..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, sleek design.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my parents to use instead of well water. They have used 5 gallon jugs, but are now using the 3 gallon jugs because they say it’s easier for them to load. Hot water is hot, but not to where it would burn you or your mouth. Design is sleek, and blends into their kitchen well.
customer_reviews.author: Hedgemoe

customer_reviews.title: Bottle sits way up high, too hard to put a 5 gallon bottle on
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit, very quiet, heats fast. The only issue for me: I didn't realize how tall it is. I can't get a 5-gallon bottle up there. (So I'll just switch to filling the bottles halfway, slowly changing to 3-gallon bottles.) Other than that simple oversight on my part, I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: BookBeetle

customer_reviews.title: Leaning forward
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these 2 years ago and it stands straight up , the new one leans forward. Avalon said that’s by design to prevent it from tipping over. That doesn’t make sense to me.Don’t think the dispenser is defective because it. I didn’t see this mentioned anywhere in the reviews so I thought I’d mention it. That’s why I only gave it 3 stars because I don’t like the fact it leans forward. The old dispenser got 5.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, be sure to get sprillproof lids or prefilled bottles
customer_reviews.text: Works great, keeps water icy cold, not too loud. Not a huge issue but just an FYI the spill proof lid requirement means I either have to buy primo or seperate spillproof lids somewhere else. Primo can be expensive and getting kids is a slight hassle since non of the stores I live around have them.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Can I return my cooler. It leaks
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I ordered this cooler and it is leaking and water has difficulty coming out. Can I return for refund
customer_reviews.author: Colleen O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Works Well "However"
customer_reviews.text: Runs well, Cold Water, Hot Water, Seems well built, However it is very noisey when the compressor is running. Not only do you have the normal hum from the unit when it is chilling the water but it also rattles the whole water cooler, so I would not advise installing this in a dorm room or bedroom if you have plans for that. I will see how long this one lasts, they seem to last only a year for me.
customer_reviews.author: southshore74

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Set up
customer_reviews.text: When my water cooler died I really didn't want drive 50 miles to a big box, so I decided to order online instead. Comparison shopping led me to the perfect solution to my issue. Now I have brand new machine, a nice warrenty and of course icy cold and steaming hot water available when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Squire

customer_reviews.title: Hot & Cold - Does The Trick
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I'm on well water and my husband refuses to drink it (I personally love it). We set this up and everything worked great. Thought we were having an issue with the hot water ... e-mailed the vendor and they answered very quickly. We're idiots and didn't see that you had to press in a button while dispensing hot water (very smart safety feature ... adult-proof!). Once we got that answer we were all set. Hot water is good and hot, cold water refreshingly cold. Compatible with all 4 versions of 5 gallon water bottles we've tried thus far.
customer_reviews.author: KelliTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our choice!
customer_reviews.text: We thought about a countertop watercooler but I am so glad we got this one. water gets super cold and super hot and what I love about this dispenser is that there are 3 on and off switches (one for hot, one for cold, and one to completely turn off cooler). 5 stars for sure, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Cooler and Saves Money
customer_reviews.text: Se-up was very easy, straight out of the box and plug-up. the Hot water is Hot and the Cold water is Cold. I am saving $20 a month just owning it, because I was paying Ready Refresh a $20 plus tax monthly rental, which added to much to the bill. I purchased my own, my budget is back on track. I would high recommend this Avalon Top Loading Water Cooler to any one, who like to drink bottle water. I just went thru Hurricane Harvey, so bottle water is very valuable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: No issues yet! I did buy special bottle caps for this dispenser based on other reviews. Does make some noise but I actually find it pretty soothing
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: not bottle water friendly
customer_reviews.text: You can’t place the spigot in the water bottle and the end result is getting water spayed everywhere. Also, you can’t return the product and there’s no replacement parts for it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Farrell

customer_reviews.title: I love the kid protection--but first i did not know how ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the kid protection--but first i did not know how it works - but i figured it out since i did not receive an instruction on how to use it. I also googled how to clean this unit. I like the color white - makes you feel very clean and dirt free. You just have to waste about 6 glasses of water before you can get rid of the "steel" taste. There is a control for hot or cold. This will save you a lot of power if you don't need hot water for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Landa

customer_reviews.title: Clean and convenient hot or cold water
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for an older water cooler, different brand. This is noisier than I expected when heating water. I think the tile floor it is on makes the vibrations louder. Its really nice to have hot water at a touch and the safety lock means no accidents.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: They had to send me a replacement after 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine in the beginning. The water was ice ice cold. After 4 weeks the water was room temperature and the unit was constantly humming; likely straining to get the water cold. Avalon support sent me a replacement unit which is working fine thus far. Customer support is very responsive to their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Spaces, Reliable Source for Refreshments
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know much about the flavor as I think it moreso depends on the water barrels you get. But for everything else you can trust that this will get the job done. Fills my cups slowly but quick enough to keep going with my day. The temperature is perfect for a smooth drink and hot enough for a quick tea. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Henriquez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Was on the fence with all the other reviews. This water dispenser is amazing. The hot water is actually hot and cold is cold. Light and easy to maneuver. It holds the 5 gal perfect and is quiet. The safety lock is amazing as it actually works. Perfect for our family
customer_reviews.author: Sam Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for any shop
customer_reviews.text: I had the other major brand prior to purchasing this one. My first one lasted about 8 years, and provided cold water immediately. The only fault with this one is that the first two ounces of water is cool, but not cold. I toss the first two ounces then the next cup is ice cold. It is a great cooler with that small exception.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Henson

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase by Far!
customer_reviews.text: We just love this water cooler. Best decision to purchase this when we did! I had a water delivery service that I won't name for over 4 years. The last year with them has been horrible! I am a handicapped middle aged woman and this company was always changing my delivery dates and times with out notification! So that's when I ordered this water cooler dispenser. Just love the ease of getting a glass of cold water or need hot water for a cup of oatmeal at the ready. The price was very reasonable and would tell everyone to buy this. Pricing was within our budget. Am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Burke

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy!
customer_reviews.text: Noisy. The unit is super loud. I’ve had it a week and it works fine, but it’s super loud. I’ve read many reviews and only a few people complained of the noise so maybe I do have a defective unit. I have to turn switch off and then turn it back on to stop the noise. The next time someone fills cold water it makes the noise again. I gave it three stars because I’m not sure how to read it. But if I don’t get this resolved I will lower my star rating to a one Star if it gets fixed I would give it a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie—San Diego

customer_reviews.title: A good value for convenient hot and cold water at home
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day and it works as advertised. I didn't notice any odors or chemical taste on initial use. The safety button on the hot water argues with me sometimes before I've had my morning coffee but that's user error. The hot water is hot enough for dehydrated foods and coffee. I don't use the cold so I could turn it off but my kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Works great, arrived fast. During setup, water just barely trickled out. I started thinking of returning it and called Avalon customer service for help. They advised me that I should turn on the unit first, that did the trick. (I was thinking I had to get the water flowing through it first for some reason.) The unit keeps water cold and the hot water is hot enough to drink tea right away without burning my mouth. I'm glad I got this model. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Burch

customer_reviews.title: So far, really good water dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Writing this having used the dispenser about two weeks in my counseling office. So far, really really good! ( It replaced another brand where first the hot water failed and then began to make a bad noise.) I like this one better anyway due to it being a little taller, more room under the hot and cold dispensers and good safety feature for the hot water which is awesomely hot! There are no children in here - if they're around definitely use the brackets to attach this to the wall and test whether or not they can figure out the hot water. I suspect due to the price it won't last forever but right now......all good!
customer_reviews.author: Shadowcat

customer_reviews.title: Too Noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is really noisy when it’s trying to cool water. If you turn the cold water part off then it’s quiet but if you want cold water and you don’t like loud humming noises, get a different cooler. If you take one cup of cold water, it runs for almost an hour, and sounds like a REALLY LOUD, old refrigerator. We have the countertop version of this Avalon cooler at work and it doesn’t make noise like this. They won’t let you return it but I got a refund from Amazon at least and am donating this. It’s not even worth “free” to me.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Breck

customer_reviews.title: Not a long term investment
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of it. Had it about a year now and the hot water is HOT. Perfect for ramen noodles or easy mac. However, after just 3 or 4 months, it stopped cooling the water. Kind of a problem for a water cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Fine Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine water cooler. My first one actually so I have no other experience to compare it to. Cold water is served cold, Hot water is served EXTREMELY hot. So hot in fact, I do not recommend serving yourself in anything but a mug. Any plastic/paper cup and you will most likely get a burn or drop it from the extreme heat. Can't give it a 5 start for I need to know its durability but I do recommend this fine dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Chills and heats water perfectly. I love to use the hot water to make oatmeal every morning. Great for tea as well. I haven't had any trouble with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nowski

customer_reviews.title: Had over 3 years and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was just thinking about how much I love this cooler so I decided to write a review. We bought this over 3 years ago and it is awesome. I absolutely love the hot water tap for making tea at night. The taps are not too low to the ground for us as we are over 6ft tall. The cold water chills fast and cold. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Never2Old2Hoop

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 years, want a better one, buy another.
customer_reviews.text: Just looked it up.. Avalon has a 12 month warranty... That's not exactly standing behind your craftsmanship. Mine lasted 2.5 years until the heating element went out. Previous one lasted six... so, off to anther brand.
customer_reviews.author: DadOfFour

customer_reviews.title: Leaked 5 gallons of water on to hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this Avalon water cooler replaced my Whirlpool water cooler that lasted a week after the warranty expired. I uncrate the Avalon unit, read the instuctions and follow them to the letter. After installing the 5 gallon water bottle I waited a few hours and water was ice cold. I came back two hours later and the entire 5 gallons had leaked on to my hardwood floors. I have no clue what it could be.
customer_reviews.author: life

customer_reviews.title: Spout area too short
customer_reviews.text: This is a good machine except it is noisier than our old one and There is not enough room under the spout for a tall glass or water bottle. I have to remove the tray to fill a 20 oz. tumbler ir bottle. Kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: J Haycock

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement
customer_reviews.text: This review is only for a short period of ownership (~1 week). Huge improvement over our old water cooler. The water flow is very fast, the cold water is cold. One thing I was very impressed with was the hot water temperature. I use an Aeropress to make coffee (recommends 175F brewing temperature), and this water cooler will fill a mug with water at >170F (starts off not that hot, but as it pours the average temp goes up).
customer_reviews.author: Karl H

customer_reviews.title: great water cooler
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Slightly smaller than the one we had before, which, for us, is a plus. Easy set up and it is working well. Love the hot water (on our old one the hot dispenser stopped working after a very short while). Great cooler. Can highly recommend. Now let's hope it'll last as long as our old one (10+yrs).
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Web site to register product not working
customer_reviews.text: Only thing about this purchase is their website won't let me register the cooler. It just sits there and eventually times out. Guess I'm on my own with this one. Hopefully it will last and not bomb out tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ireland

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited over a month for this to arrive and now within a couple weeks it's leaking all over the place and they have a no return policy. It's a nice looking water cooler and keeps the water cold but it's no good if it's leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M

customer_reviews.title: Needs some illumination
customer_reviews.text: The symbols are supposed to light up - when the water is cooling or heating up - they don’t And when filling my cup - there is no light to see the water level - I am not sure if that is a feature or not - Water is cold - haven’t tried the hot water yet. I am going to reach out to the company
customer_reviews.author: Ali C

customer_reviews.title: Great price.  Taller than other water dispensers.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. With Child Protective Button on how water. Too tall for me to put the jug of water but my tall brother can put the jug of water for me. I will need a stall to step on in order for me to put the jug on top of this water dispenser. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Lauron Panoringan

customer_reviews.title: Water Flows Slowly
customer_reviews.text: The rate at which this water cooler allows water to flow out is too slow. It comes out in a concentrated stream of maybe 1/4” diameter. Slower than the average water cooler, I’d guess it has to do with getting the heating and cooling elements to keep up. I don’t use those much but they haven’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: leaking on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Water cooler worked well and then it started leaking about 2 weeks ago I had to take the water out to stop it from leaking, I have insurance what do I do?
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's good but just good.
customer_reviews.text: The device is nice but I feel it could be colder. Also, why is there an on off switch for cold and hot water? Makes no sense to me because you can't regulate the temperature. I think I could have paid for the cheaper device. However, maybe this one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: cat9

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Dispenser!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Dispenser to replace one that we had used for many, many years. This dispenser has safety features that the old one did not. For example, in order to dispense hot water you have to push in a button before the hot water flows. It's a great comfort to know that a small child can't easily get hot water on themselves. The other safety feature is that it comes with a safety clamp that can be attached to the cooler & back wall so that it can't be bumped over. It's an attractive cooler & produces very hot (hot enough for an instant coffee) & also a nice chilled glass of water. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Item not returnable even shipped sold by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like the temp of water, wasnt cold enought and Our new unit gave our water a plastic taste even after 5 gallons cycled thru. Amazon return process stated "item not eligible for return" i would recommend buying elsewhere since Amazon doesn't disclose this item as non returnable until you try to return it. As of June 2019
customer_reviews.author: FLMartin

customer_reviews.title: Cold is plenty cold, hot is steaming hot
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, I like the dispenser style, easy one hand dispensing. Nice narrow unit, nice little footprint fits in our tiny kitchen, easy to setup and my kids love it as they can reach it easy to fill their own bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa FH

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I wish it had a bigger hot water tank.
customer_reviews.text: I got this during a "lightning sale" and it was less expensive than what I could find locally. It seems to work fine. No funny plastic taste in the water. The cold works amazingly well. The hot isn't hot enough in my opinion and the tank for the hot water isn't as big as I expected. Overall I'm happy with it. Good quality and it does what they say it does.
customer_reviews.author: Skitch

customer_reviews.title: this thing started leaking 2years after i bought it
customer_reviews.text: this water dispenser started leaking right at two years after owning it it should last longer than that i would not recommend this unit not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: Cold water function unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: The option for really cold water has stopped working after only a few months - we've been away a lot and turn it off when we're gone, so it's been used far few hours than more typical 24 hour use. I never turn the hot water function on, so I cant comment on its reliability. I had been really happy with it. Will contact manufacturer directly to see what they can do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tired of renting !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler instead of renting one. So far so good The only issue is its hard to fill a small water bottle with the spout the way its made.
customer_reviews.author: tfd

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used to having well water. Moved and now have public water. I can't get used to taste. Purchased this and it solved the problem. I love having it. Works well and doesn't take up a lot of space. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: angies favorites

customer_reviews.title: Cold water refrigerator is noisy and runs continuously
customer_reviews.text: I did purchase this from the Amazon Warehouse in "like new" condition. It was so noisy that I had to move it into the garage where it seems to run for very long periods of time. I am returning this for a different brand cooler, hopefully it will be quieter and I can move it back into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some help reattaching a seal and valve after doing a deep clean and called Avalon support and within seconds i was talking with Gabrielle at support, she was fantastic, patiently walked me through step-by-step.
customer_reviews.author: leibke

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Description was as promised. This is a great water dispenser if you’re not trying to spend a lot. Works perfect , hot water is hot and cold water is cold. Quiet while running and water comes out at a good pace. Definitely happy with purchase and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: This is the best water cooler ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best water cooler ever. Much better and far cheaper than the competitors. I thought there was an issue with the heating/cooling lights etc. but they only illuminate when heating and/or cooling. Best customer service on the market. They emailed me within an hour and had a a service tech call me the next day as it was late in day when I contacted them
customer_reviews.author: Tim J.

customer_reviews.title: Cold as iced water and Hot enough for Ramen noodles.
customer_reviews.text: After figuring out what was causing the water to leak all over the place, it turns out I had a defective water jug. Everything now works and I'm enjoying it so far. The cold water is almost as cold as iced water. The hot water is hot enough for making Ramen noodles or even hot chocolate. However, I do not like the build material, which is plastic, it is weak and easily scratched. Also I do not know if the internal water storage inside is plastic or stainless steal, there's nothing that indicates which. Giving it 4 stars because the instruction were poorly written with spelling errors and lack of specifications.
customer_reviews.author: Khang

customer_reviews.title: Verrrrry slow water streams and Cold ISN'T cold enough
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and I expect it will hold up very well. I haven't used a timer yet to see how long it takes to fill a "Mr. Coffee" 10-cup carafe, but it seems like an eternity. I'm not interested in using the "hot" feature, but, making the assumption that spigot's water is room temperature, was surprised it is even slower delivering the water than the spigot for the cold. Perhaps I'll time them both. My previous cooler served me well for about 9 years, but I decided to try this new one because of its rave reviews. Oh well. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: l.u.

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great water cooler, cold water, and hot too if you want that feature. Has a button on back to turn off both the hot and cold storage. Water flows good, water tabs operate smoothly. Air bubbles up easily keeping the water flowing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike VR

customer_reviews.title: not made to last
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted, but the dispenser has now stopped producing hot water after only 20 months of ownership. At this price point, I would have expected better durability than this. The previous water dispenser I owned lasted 5-6 years before it died.
customer_reviews.author: hello

customer_reviews.title: Great water cooler
customer_reviews.text: We love this watercooler!! We originally bought one from Lowes and it was crap and started pouring out plastic chards. Thats when we turned to amazon and replaced it with this cooler. Im so happy we did. The hot water is really hot which is great for instant coffee and tea.
customer_reviews.author: N.S

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was just what I expected am very happy with it no leaks and was taller than my last one which is a plus
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler, Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this cooler and the cold water is cooler than the previous one that we owned. We had a small leak when something wasn't lined up right, but after reaching out to the customer service, they were excellent in helping us resolve this issue very quickly. Thank you to Shane J!
customer_reviews.author: ZW.

product_meta.title: Avalon A1WATERCOOLER A1 Top Loading Cooler Dispenser, Hot & Cold Water, Child Safety Lock, Innovative Slim Design, Holds 3 or 5 Gallon Bottles-UL/Energy Star Approved, White
product_meta.description: The Avalon Hot/Cold Water Cooler is made with innovation and style. The easy-to-use paddle spouts make it so much more convenient to use. Simply press your cup against the paddle to let the flow of water to come out. The machines highly efficient compressor makes the cold water crisp and ice cold at approximately 47° F without the need of adding ice cubes to your drink. The hot faucet is hot enough to cook one's tea or coffee or any other steaming hot beverage at approximately 185° F. Due to the extremely hot water, we’ve added a child safety lock on the hot water faucet. The dimensions are 11.25x10.75x42 inches. The water cooler is UL listed and complies with all standards of Energy Star. Dispensing area: 9 x 3.25 x 7 Inches, drip tray: Removable, No Drain, Heating Power: 420W, Cooling Power: 100w
feature_bullets: HOT & COLD WATER SPOUTS: When you use our water cooler dispenser you can choose between a Crisp Cold & Piping Hot Output, making it ideal for cool refreshments or toasty beverages.
CHILD SAFE: Our water cooler dispenser is UL/Energy Star Approved and features a child safety lock on the hot water spout so the entire family can use it worry free!
INNOVATIVE & STYLISH DESIGN: Avalon’s Top Loading Water Cooler Dispenser features a slim design that won’t look bulky, even in small spaces, and fits in any corner of the home.
TIME SAVING: Our top loading water cooler dispenser saves time when you need to make a quick cup of tea, hot cocoa, or instant soup! You never have to wait for a pot or kettle to boil.
TOP LOADING DISPENSER: This water cooler dispenser loads from the top & allows you to spot if the dispenser is running out of water, which is a great feature for office settings.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,239 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
